title: Finding Student Pairs with Similar Scores
description: The school wants to identify pairs of students who have similar total scores across all subjects, with a difference of no more than 5 points. Write a query to list pairs of student full names and their total scores, ensuring each pair is listed only once.
hint:

Use self-join logic, make it clear.
Total scores and compare the two,
